gwt.drawStackRandomized: These cards are in your draw stack, but they are displayed in a random order. The actual order is only known by the server, so you don't know which you will draw next.
gwt.confirmEndTurn: You can still perform actions. Are you sure you want to end your turn?
gwt.deliverRequiresCertificates: You must spend at least {{atLeast}} certificates to deliver to {{city}}.
gwt.deliverOptionalCertificates: Optionally, you may spend additional certificates when delivering to {{city}}, to get a higher payout.
gwt.spendCertificates: Select the number of certificates you want to use:

cattleMarket.select:
Pick a single cattle card or a pair of cattle cards and click confirm.
You can repeat this action as long as you have enough dollars and cowboys.

gwt.endTurn: There are no more actions you can perform. Automatically ending your turn in {{secs}} seconds.

popover.handValue: The breeding values of each different type of cattle that you have in hand is counted towards your total breeding value. This means each type is counted only once, no matter how many cards of that type you have.
popover.certificates: The total number of certificates, both temporary certificates as indicated by the marker on the player's board, as any permanent certificates the player may have acquired through station master tiles.
popover.cattleCard: This is a {{type}} cattle card with breeding value {{breedingValue}} and worth {{points}} points.
popover.objectiveCard: This is an Objective Card that is worth {{points}} points. When played the player may: {{action}}. If not completed, the player will lose {{penalty}} points.

objective.completed: This objective has been completed and scores {{score}} points.
objective.notCompleted: This objective has (not yet) been completed and scores {{score}} points.

popover.exchangeTokens: The number of exchange tokens a player has. Click on this icon to use an exchange token at any time.

stationMaster.PERM_CERT_POINTS_FOR_EACH_2_CERTS: Station master tile that gives 1 permanent certificate and 3 points for every 2 certificates.
stationMaster.PERM_CERT_POINTS_FOR_EACH_2_HAZARDS: Station master tile that gives 1 permanent certificate and 3 points for every 2 hazards.
stationMaster.PERM_CERT_POINTS_FOR_TEEPEE_PAIRS: Station master tile that gives 1 permanent certificate and 3 points for every pair of blue and green teepees.
stationMaster.REMOVE_HAZARD_OR_TEEPEE_POINTS_FOR_EACH_: Station master tile that allows removing a hazard or trading with the tribes and gives 3 points for every 2 committed objective cards.
stationMaster.TWO_PERM_CERTS: Station master tile that gives 2 permanent certificates but 0 extra points.
stationMaster.TWELVE_DOLLARS: Station master tile that allows gaining 12 dollars but gives 0 extra points.
stationMaster.PERM_CERT_POINTS_PER_2_STATIONS: Station master tile that gives 1 permanent certificate and 3 points for every 2 upgraded stations.
stationMaster.GAIN_2_CERTS_POINTS_PER_BUILDING: Station master tile that allows you to move the certificate marker up to 2 spaces and gives 2 points for every building.
stationMaster.PLACE_BRANCHLET_POINTS_PER_2_EXCHANGE_TO: Station master tile that allows you to place a branchlet and gives 5 points for every 2 exchange tokens.
stationMaster.GAIN_EXCHANGE_TOKEN_POINTS_PER_AREA: Station master tile gives an exchange token and 2 points for every area in which you have placed at least 1 branchlet.

popover.buildings: View the buildings that are available.
popover.objectives: View the objectives that must be completed and the tiles collected.
popover.drawStack: The stack of cards from which new cards are drawn and added to your hand. Whenever the draw stack runs out, any discarded cards are shuffled and this becomes the new draw stack.
popover.discardPile: The cards that have been discarded. Whenever the draw stack runs out, any discarded cards are shuffled and this becomes the new draw stack.

building.null: Select this location to place one of your private buildings
building.A:
Neutral building A
Action: Discard 1 Guernsey cattle card and gain 2 dollars
Action: Hire 1 worker
Action: Hire 1 worker (-2$)
building.B:
Neutral building B
Action: Discard 1 Dutch Belt cattle card and gain 2 dollars
Action: Place one of your own buildings onto a building space on the trail.
building.C:
Neutral building C
Action: Move certificate marker one space forward OR gain one objective card
Action: Move your engine up to as many spaces forward as you have engineers.
building.D:
Neutral building D
Action: Trade with the Tribes OR pay 2 dollars to move your engine up to 2 spaces forward
Action: Perform a single or double auxiliary action
building.E:
Neutral building E
Action: Discard 1 Black Angus cattle card and gain 2 dollars
Action: Buy cattle cards from the cattle market
building.F:
Neutral building F
Action: Discard a pair of cattle cards and gain 4 dollars
Action: Remove a hazard for $7
building.G:
Neutral building G
Action: Move your engine up to as many spaces forward as you have engineers.
Action: Perform a single or double auxiliary action
building.1a:
Building 1a
Action: Gain 2 dollars for each of your private buildings located in the woods
building.2a:
Building 2a
Action: Discard 1 Guernsey cattle card and gain 4 dollars
Action: Buy cattle cards from the cattle market
building.3a:
Building 3a
Action: Discard a pair of cattle cards and gain 3 dollars
Action: Move your cattleman 1 step forward
building.4a:
Building 4a
Action: Remove a hazard for $5
Action:Move your cattleman up to 2 steps forward
building.5a:
Building 5a
Action: Hire 1 worker (cost reduced by $1)
Action: Move your engine up to as many spaces as you have engineers
building.6a:
Building 6a
Action: Discard 1 Holstein cattle card and gain 10 dollars
Action: Perform a single or double auxiliary action
building.7a:
Building 7a
Action: For each pair of 1 green and 1 blue teepees you have collected, move your certificate marker up to 2 spaces forward and gain 2 dollars
building.8a:
Building 8a
Action: Trade with the Tribes OR perform a double or single auxiliary action
Action: Move your engine up to 2 spaces forward
building.9a:
Building 9a
Action: Move your engine up to 3 spaces forward
Action: Extraordinary delivery: move your engine backwards 1 or more spaces. Then you can delivery to a city whose value is lower or equal to the number of spaces you moved your engine backwards. You do not pay any transport costs. If your engine landed on a station, you may upgrade the station after delivering to the city.
building.10a:
Building 10a
Action: Move your certificate marker as far forward as possible
Action: Move your cattleman up to 5 steps forward
building.1b:
Building 1b
Action: Discard 1 objective card to move your certificate marker up to 2 spaces forward
Action: Move your engine backwards and gain 3 dollars
building.2b:
Building 2b
Action: Discard 1 Jersey cattle card and move your engine 1 space forward
Action: Discard 1 Dutch Belt cattle card and gain 3 dollars
building.3b:
Building 3b
Action: Perform a single or double auxiliary action
Action: Move your cattleman 1 step forward
building.4b:
Building 4b
Action: Draw up to as many cards as you have cowboys. Then discard as many cards a you drew.
Action: Move your cattleman up to 3 steps forward
building.5b:
Building 5b
Action: Discard 1 Black Angus cattle card to move your certificate marker up to 2 spaces forward
Action: Gain as many dollars as you have engineers
building.6b:
Building 6b
Action: Discard 1 cattle card to gain 3 dollars and gain 1 objective card directly to your hand
building.7b:
Building 7b
Action: Move your engine up to as many spaces forward as you have buildings in the woods
building.8b:
Building 8b
Action: Copy the actions of an adjacent building
building.9b:
Building 9b
Action: Upgrade any station behind your engine
building.10b:
Building 10b
Action: Gain 4 dollars
Action: Move your engine up to 4 spaces forward
Action: Move your cattleman up to 4 steps forward
building.11b:
Building 11b
Action: Move your engine up to as many spaces forward as you have removed hazards
building.12a:
Building 12a
Action: For each bell space on your player board, that is completely cleared, you may move your certificate marker 1 space forward and gain 1 dollar
building.12b:
Building 12b
Action: Gain as many dollars as you have craftsmen
Action: Place a branchlet
building.13a:
Building 13a
Action: Discard 1 Jersey cattle card for a single auxiliary action
Action: Place one of your own buildings onto a building space on the trail ($1 per craftsman)
building.13b:
Building 13b
Action: Gain 2 dollars per upgraded station
Action: Perform a single or double auxiliary action

location.FLOOD-RISK-1: Risk Action: Discard 1 Jersey to move your certificate marker 1 space forward and gain 2 dollars
location.FLOOD-RISK-2: Risk Action: Discard 1 Jersey to move your certificate marker 1 space forward and gain 2 dollars
location.DROUGHT-RISK-1: Risk Action: Discard a cattle card to move your certificate marker 1 space forward
location.INDIAN-TRADE-RISK-1: Risk Action: Discard a cattle card to move your certificate marker 1 space forward
location.INDIAN-TRADE-RISK-2: Risk Action: Discard 1 Jersey to move your certificate marker 1 space forward and gain 2 dollars
location.ROCKFALL-RISK-1: Risk Action: Discard a cattle card to move your certificate marker 1 space forward
location.ROCKFALL-RISK-2: Risk Action: Discard 1 Jersey to move your certificate marker 1 space forward and gain 2 dollars

mediumTownTile.GAIN_5_DOLLARS_OR_TAKE_CATTLE_CARD: When you place a branchlet here, you gain 5 dollars or may take a cattle card of breeding value 3 from the cattle market.
mediumTownTile.HIRE_WORKER_PLUS_2: When you place a branchlet here, you may hire a worker (+$2).
mediumTownTile.REMOVE_2_CARDS: When you place a branchlet here, you may remove up to 2 cards from your hand.
mediumTownTile.MOVE_ENGINE_3_FORWARD: When you place a branchlet here, you may move your engine forward up to 3 spaces.
mediumTownTile.PLACE_BUILDING_FOR_FREE: When you place a branchlet here, you may place a building for $0.

log.EVERY_OTHER_PLAYER_HAS_1_TURN: every other player has 1 more turn
log.MAY_REMOVE_BLACK_DISC_INSTEAD_OF_WHITE: may remove a Black disc instead of a White disc
log.MUST_REMOVE_DISC_FROM_STATION: must remove a disc from a Station
log.MAY_REMOVE_HAZARD_FOR_FREE: may remove a Hazard for free
log.MAY_PLACE_CHEAP_BUILDING: may place a building for $1 per Craftsman
log.MAY_DISCARD_1_JERSEY_TO_GAIN_1_CERTIFICA: may discard 1 Jersey to gain 1 certificate
log.MAY_DISCARD_1_JERSEY_TO_GAIN_2_CERTIFICA: may discard 1 Jersey to gain 2 certificates

action.APPOINT_STATION_MASTER: appoints {{value1}} to station master and receives station master tile: {{value2}}
action.BUY_2_CATTLE: buys a {{value2}} ({{value3}}VP) and a {{value4}} ({{value5}}VP) for ${{value1}} and {{value6}} cowboys
action.DISCARD_1_BLACK_ANGUS_TO_GAIN_2_CERTIFIC: discards 1 Black Angus to gain 2 certificates
action.DISCARD_1_CATTLE_CARD_TO_GAIN_3_DOLLARS_: disards 1 cattle card to gain $3 and must add 1 Objective Card to hand
action.DISCARD_1_CATTLE_CARD_TO_GAIN_1_CERTIFIC: discards 1 cattle card to gain 1 certificate
action.DISCARD_1_JERSEY_FOR_SINGLE_AUXILIARY_AC: discards 1 Jersey for a single auxiliary action
action.DISCARD_1_JERSEY_TO_GAIN_1_CERTIFICATE_A: discards 1 Jersey to gain 1 certificate and $2
action.DISCARD_1_JERSEY_TO_MOVE_ENGINE_1_FORWAR: discards 1 Jersey to move engine 1 forward
action.DISCARD_1_OBJECTIVE_CARD_TO_GAIN_2_CERTI: discards 1 Objective Card to gain 2 certificates
action.DISCARD_PAIR_TO_GAIN_3_DOLLARS: discards pair of cattle cards to gain $3
action.DISCARD_PAIR_TO_GAIN_4_DOLLARS: discards pair of cattle cards to gain $4
action.DRAW_2_CATTLE_CARDS: adds 2 cattle cards to the cattle market
action.EXTRAORDINARY_DELIVERY: starts extraordinary delivery and moves engine {{value1}} backwards
action.GAIN_2_DOLLARS_PER_BUILDING_IN_WOODS: gains ${{value1}} from buildings in the woods
action.GAIN_2_CERTIFICATES_AND_2_DOLLARS_PER_TE: gains 2 certificates and $2 per pair of teepees
action.MOVE_TO_BUILDING: moves cattleman to building {{value2}} at location {{value1}}
action.MOVE_TO_PLAYER_BUILDING: moves cattleman to building {{value2}} of {{value3}} at location {{value1}}
action.MOVE_TO_BUILDING_WITHOUT_FEES: moves cattleman to building {{value2}} at location {{value1}} without paying
action.MOVE_TO_PLAYER_BUILDING_WITHOUT_FEES: moves cattleman to building {{value2}} of {{value3}} at location {{value1}} without paying
action.MOVE_ENGINE_1_BACKWARDS_TO_REMOVE_1_CARD: moves engine 1 backwards to remove a card
action.MOVE_ENGINE_2_BACKWARDS_TO_REMOVE_2_CARD: moves engine 2 backwards to remove 2 cards
action.MOVE_ENGINE_FORWARD_UP_TO_NUMBER_OF_BUIL: moves engine forward up to number of buildings in the woods
action.PAY_1_DOLLAR_AND_MOVE_ENGINE_1_BACKWARDS: pays $1 and moves engine 1 backwards to gain 1 certificate
action.PAY_2_DOLLARS_AND_MOVE_ENGINE_2_BACKWARD: pays $2 and moves engine 2 backwards to gain 2 certificates
action.SINGLE_AUXILIARY_ACTION: wants to perform a single auxiliary action
action.SINGLE_OR_DOUBLE_AUXILIARY_ACTION: wants to perform a single or double auxiliary action
action.USE_ADJACENT_BUILDING: wants to use actions of an adjacent Building
action.UNLOCK_BLACK_OR_WHITE: removes a disc from player board: {{value1}}
action.UNLOCK_WHITE: removes a disc from player board: {{value1}}
action.DISCARD_CATTLE_CARD_TO_PLACE_BRANCHLET: discards a {{value1}} cattle card to place a branchlet
action.TAKE_BREEDING_VALUE_3_CATTLE_CARD: takes a {{value1}} cattle card from the market

values.PERM_CERT_POINTS_FOR_TEEPEE_PAIRS: Permanent certificate + 3 points per teepee pair
values.REMOVE_HAZARD_OR_TEEPEE_POINTS_FOR_EACH_: Remove hazard/trade with Tribes + 3 points per 2 objective cards
values.GAIN_2_CERTS_POINTS_PER_BUILDING: Move certificate marker 2 + 2 points per building
values.PLACE_BRANCHLET_POINTS_PER_2_EXCHANGE_TO: Place branchlet + 5 points per 2 exchange tokens
values.GAIN_EXCHANGE_TOKEN_POINTS_PER_AREA: Gain 1 exchange token + 2 points per area with branchlet
values.AUX_MOVE_ENGINE_BACKWARDS_TO_GAIN_CERT: Pay $1 and move engine 1 backwards to gain 1 certificate
values.AUX_MOVE_ENGINE_BACKWARDS_TO_REMOVE_CARD: Move engine backwards to remove card
values.AUX_DISCARD_CATTLE_CARD_TO_PLACE_BRANCHL: Discard '2' cattle card to place branchlet

instructions.PLACE_BID: Place your VP bid for turn order
instructions.BUY_CATTLE: Pick one cattle card or a pair from the cattle market
instructions.DISCARD_1_CATTLE_CARD_TO_GAIN_3_DOLLARS_: Discard 1 cattle card to gain 3 dollars and add 1 objective card to your hand
instructions.ADD_1_OBJECTIVE_CARD_TO_HAND: Add 1 objective card to your hand
instructions.DISCARD_1_CATTLE_CARD_TO_GAIN_1_CERTIFIC: Discard 1 cattle card to gain 1 certificate
instructions.DISCARD_1_OBJECTIVE_CARD_TO_GAIN_2_CERTI: Discard 1 objective card to gain 2 certificates
instructions.DISCARD_PAIR_TO_GAIN_3_DOLLARS: Discard a pair of cattle cards to gain 3 dollars
instructions.DISCARD_PAIR_TO_GAIN_4_DOLLARS: Discard a pair of cattle cards to gain 4 dollars
instructions.MOVE_2_FORWARD: Move your cattleman at most 2 steps forward
instructions.MOVE_3_FORWARD: Move your cattleman at most 3 steps forward
instructions.MOVE_3_FORWARD_WITHOUT_FEES: Move your cattleman at most 3 steps forward without paying fees
instructions.MOVE_4_FORWARD: Move your cattleman at most 4 steps forward
instructions.MOVE_5_FORWARD: Move your cattleman at most 5 steps forward
instructions.MOVE_ENGINE_1_BACKWARDS_TO_GAIN_3_DOLLAR: Move your engine 1 backwards to gain 3 dollars
instructions.MOVE_ENGINE_1_BACKWARDS_TO_REMOVE_1_CARD: Move your engine 1 backwards to remove 1 card
instructions.MOVE_ENGINE_2_BACKWARDS_TO_REMOVE_2_CARD: Move your engine 2 backwards to remove 2 cards
instructions.MOVE_ENGINE_AT_LEAST_1_BACKWARDS_AND_GAI: Move your engine at least 1 backwards and gain 3 dollars
instructions.MOVE_ENGINE_AT_MOST_2_FORWARD: Move your engine at most 2 forward
instructions.MOVE_ENGINE_AT_MOST_3_FORWARD: Move your engine at most 3 forward
instructions.MOVE_ENGINE_AT_MOST_4_FORWARD: Move your engine at most 4 forward
instructions.MOVE_ENGINE_FORWARD_UP_TO_NUMBER_OF_BUIL: Move your engine forward up to the number buildings in the woods
instructions.PAY_1_DOLLAR_AND_MOVE_ENGINE_1_BACKWARDS: Pay 1 dollar and move your engine 1 backwards to gain 1 certificate
instructions.PAY_1_DOLLAR_TO_MOVE_ENGINE_1_FORWARD: Pay 1 dollar to move your engine 1 forward
instructions.PAY_2_DOLLARS_AND_MOVE_ENGINE_2_BACKWARD: Pay 2 dollars and move your engine 2 backwards to gain 2 certificates
instructions.PAY_2_DOLLARS_TO_MOVE_ENGINE_2_FORWARD: Pay 2 dollars to move your engine 2 forward
instructions.PLACE_BUILDING: Select a location to place a building on. Then select which building to place.
instructions.PLACE_CHEAP_BUILDING: Select a location to place a building on. Then select which building to place.
instructions.REMOVE_HAZARD: Remove a hazard from the trail
instructions.SINGLE_OR_DOUBLE_AUXILIARY_ACTION: Perform a single or double auxiliary action
instructions.UPGRADE_ANY_STATION_BEHIND_ENGINE: Upgrade any station that is behind your engine
instructions.USE_ADJACENT_BUILDING: Use the actions of an adjacent building
instructions.UNLOCK_BLACK_OR_WHITE: Remove a disc from your player board
instructions.UNLOCK_WHITE: Remove a disc with white corners from your player board
instructions.DOWNGRADE_STATION: Remove a disc from one of your stations
instructions.DISCARD_CATTLE_CARD_TO_PLACE_BRANCHLET: Select a cattle card of breeding value 2 to discard and to place a branchlet
instructions.PLACE_BRANCHLET: Select a town to place a branchlet on
instructions.PLACE_BUILDING_FOR_FREE: Select a location to place a building on. Then select which building to place.
instructions.TAKE_BONUS_STATION_MASTER: Select a bonus station master tile to take it
instructions.TAKE_BREEDING_VALUE_3_CATTLE_CARD: Select a card from the cattle market to take it

descriptions.SINGLE_OR_DOUBLE_AUXILIARY_ACTION: Perform a single or double auxiliary action
descriptions.UPGRADE_ANY_STATION_BEHIND_ENGINE: Upgrade any station that is behind your engine
descriptions.USE_ADJACENT_BUILDING: Use the actions of an adjacent building
descriptions.UNLOCK_BLACK_OR_WHITE: Remove a disc from your player board
descriptions.UNLOCK_WHITE: Remove a disc with white corners from your player board
descriptions.DOWNGRADE_STATION: Remove a disc from one of your stations
descriptions.TAKE_BONUS_STATION_MASTER: You may take a bonus station master tile
descriptions.GAIN_EXCHANGE_TOKEN: You gain an additional exchange token
descriptions.USE_EXCHANGE_TOKEN: Use an exchange token to draw up to 2 cards and then discard as many as you drew
descriptions.DISCARD_CATTLE_CARD_TO_PLACE_BRANCHLET: Discard a cattle card of breeding value 2 to place a branchlet on an accessible town
descriptions.PLACE_BRANCHLET: Place a branchlet on an accessible town
descriptions.GAIN_1_DOLLAR_PER_CRAFTSMAN: Gain 1 dollar per craftsman on your player board
descriptions.GAIN_1_CERTIFICATE_AND_1_DOLLAR_PER_BELL: Move your certificate marker up to 1 space forward and gain 1 dollar per bell icon that is completely cleared on your player board
descriptions.GAIN_2_CERTIFICATES: Move your certificate marker up to 2 spaces forward
descriptions.UPGRADE_STATION_TOWN: Upgrade the station by removing a disc from your player board and placing it on the station. You have to pay the cost that is displayed next to the station. If there is a station master tile available, you may take it by appointing one of your workers to become the station master.
descriptions.PLACE_BUILDING_FOR_FREE: Place a building on the trail for $0. You still need the amount of craftsmen that is displayed on the building tile.
descriptions.TAKE_BREEDING_VALUE_3_CATTLE_CARD: Take a cattle card of breeding value 3 from the cattle market for $0

errors.NOT_ENOUGH_COWBOYS: You don't have enough cowboys to perform this action.
errors.ALREADY_AT_SPACE: You already are at this space.
errors.ALREADY_DELIVERED_TO_CITY: You already delivered to this city.
errors.ALREADY_HAS_STATION_MASTER: You already have this station master tile.
errors.ALREADY_PLAYER_ON_SPACE: There is already another player on this space.
errors.AT_LEAST_2_PLAYERS_REQUIRED: You need at least 2 players to start this game.
errors.AT_MOST_4_PLAYERS_SUPPORTED: You can play this game with max 4 players.
errors.CANNOT_REPLACE_BUILDING_OF_OTHER_PLAYER: You cannot replace the building of another player.
errors.CANNOT_REPLACE_NEUTRAL_BUILDING: You cannot replace a neutral building.
errors.CANNOT_STEP_DIRECTLY_FROM_TO: You cannot move directly from your current location to this location.
errors.CARD_NOT_IN_HAND: You don't have this card in your hand.
errors.CATTLE_CARDS_NOT_IN_HAND: You don't have these cattle cards in your hand.
errors.CATTLE_CARD_NOT_AVAILABLE: This cattle card is not available.
errors.CITY_VALUE_MUST_BE_LESS_THEN_OR_EQUAL_TO: You must pick a city whose value is less than or equal to the number of spaces you moved your engine backwards.
errors.MUST_CHOOSE_ACTION: You must choose one of the actions.
errors.MUST_PICK_WHITE_DISC: You must pick a disc with white corners.
errors.MUST_SPECIFY_CATTLE_CARD: You must pick a cattle card.
errors.NOT_ENOUGH_BALANCE_TO_PAY: You don't have enough balance to pay for this action.
errors.NOT_ENOUGH_BREEDING_VALUE: You don't have enough breeding value to deliver to this city.
errors.NOT_ENOUGH_CATTLE_CARDS_OF_BREEDING_VALU: There are not enough cattle cards available with this breeding value.
errors.NOT_ENOUGH_CERTIFICATES: You don't have enough certificates to deliver to this city.
errors.NOT_ENOUGH_CRAFTSMEN: You don't have enough craftsmen to build this building.
errors.NOT_FIRST_ACTION: You must perform another action first.
errors.NO_ACTIONS: There are no actions to perform.
errors.NO_TEEPEE_AT_LOCATION: There is no teepee at this location.
errors.OBJECTIVE_CARD_NOT_AVAILABLE: This objective card is not available.
errors.REPLACEMENT_BUILDING_MUST_BE_HIGHER: You must pick a building that has a higher value than the one you are trying to upgrade.
errors.SPACE_NOT_REACHABLE: This space is not reachable with your engine right now.
errors.STATION_MUST_BE_BEHIND_ENGINE: The station must be behind your engine.
errors.STEPS_EXCEED_LIMIT: This location is not reachable within your current step limit.
errors.WORKERS_EXCEED_LIMIT: You cannot have more workers of this type.
errors.LOCATION_NOT_ADJACENT: This location is not adjacent to your current location.
errors.MUST_START_ON_NEUTRAL_BUILDING: You must start on a neutral building.
errors.CITY_NOT_ACCESSIBLE: This city is not accessible from the Kansas City office or any of the towns where you have placed a branchlet.
errors.ALREADY_PLACED_BRANCHLET: You already placed a branchlet on this town.
errors.NOT_ENOUGH_EXCHANGE_TOKENS: You do not have enough exchange tokens.
errors.NO_BRANCHLETS: You do not have any branchlets left to place on a town.
errors.STATION_MASTER_NOT_AVAILABLE: This station master tile is not available.
errors.INVALID_CATTLE_TYPE: This cattle card type is not valid for this action.
